sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0115 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAMY_SEIL_NUM , FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD , FAMY_NM , FAMY_RESN_REGN_NUM , YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , SCLC_DIV_CD , ACAD_ABTY_DIV_CD , SCHL_NM , CRR_CD , WK_OFC_NM , INBY_NM , FRGNR_YN , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , FAMY_PART_NOTE_CTNT , NATN_CD , FAMY_CHBTT_YN , FAMY_ALLW_YN , SCHL_EXPN_ADMCL_YN , YRTX_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , (select NVL(MAX(FAMY_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) from PSNL0115 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , #famyRelaDivCd# , #famyNm# , replace(#famyResnRegnNum#, '-', '') , #yoobhMnthDay# , #sclcDivCd# , #acadAbtyDivCd# , #schlNm# , #crrCd# , #wkOfcNm# , #inbyNm# , #frgnrYn# , #dabtyDivCd# , #dabtyGrdeCd# , #famyPartNoteCtnt# , #natnCd# , #famyChbttYn# , #famyAllwYn# , #schlExpnAdmclYn# , #yrtxYn# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
